subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: For the first time since 1979, two Original Six teams — the Bruins and the Blackhawks — will duel for the right to splash Champagne into the Stanley Cup.
snippet: For the first time since 1979, two Original Six teams — the Bruins and the Blackhawks — will duel for the right to splash Champagne into the Stanley Cup.
